TEXT.TITLE: HAYES-ALBION <HAY> DELAYS SPECIAL MEETING
TEXT.BODY: Hayes-Albion Corp said it has delayed the special meeting at which shareholders will vote on its merger into Harvard Industries Inc <HAVA> until March 24 from March 17 due to a delay in Securities and Exchange Commission clearance of proxy materials. Reuter
